about_the_game:
BALL IN THE BOX Just put the ball in the box

  • Designed for puzzle enthusiasts of all levels (even if you're new to physics puzzles);

  • Solve 27 puzzles carefully crafted to challenge your mind and skills;

  • Enjoy a minimalist, beautifully designed game environment with geometric shapes and soothing colors;

  • Focus and concentration to put the ball in the box;

  • Hard game, use your skills to win each phase where even luck and patience will be your allies.

  • Feedback sounds only for a more immersive experience;

  • Extra levels for highly skilled players looking for an additional challenge;

  • Every aspect of the game was created with love and craftsmanship;

    Are you up to the challenge of guiding the ball into the box? Test your skills and enjoy the journey.
